summary: This bill, the Protecting Life from Chemical Abortions Act, aims to restrict access to abortion drugs. It prohibits the Secretary of Health and Human Services from declaring a public health emergency related to abortion and terminates any existing such declarations. The bill also mandates the reinstatement of in-person dispensing requirements for abortion drugs, limits the Secretary's ability to reduce protections related to these drugs, and specifies data collection requirements for abortion reporting. The definition of abortion is also provided within its context.
